lexUnit.name: segment.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: each of the parts into which something is or may be divided

sentence.text: Nevertheless an important start has been made and some students are being exposed to a segment of African literature .
One has only to glance at a human skeleton to see the numerous segments of the vertebral column .
